The interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) promoter consists of several independent T cell receptor ( TcR ) responsive elements .
The induction of promoters dependent on these elements is inhibitable by the immunosuppressants cyclosporin A ( CsA ) and tacrolimus ( FK-506 ) .

trigger: These data provide the first demonstration in vivo that activation of a protein phosphatase can inactivate I kappa B , and suggest one possible explanation for mechanism - based toxicities associated with FK-506 and CsA by demonstrating that these drugs can inhibit the calcineurin - dependent activation of a virtually ubiquitous transcription factor .
